title: Truffle's Sad Song
description: Truffle's Sad Song is a beautiful and timeless tale of a pudgy pika named Punch who strives at all cost to help his new friend, Truffle, overcome his great sadness by showing him all the beauty and magic nature has to offer. J. F. Cicci wrote this story for her brother, Michael, in the summer of 2011. Based loosely on Michael's life, J. F. Cicci now shares her brother's story so that it can inspire more children to help those in need of peace and happiness.
author: J.F. Cicci
